product_name: Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Vest - Women's
long_description: On blustery approaches, chilly rock routes and full-on alpine missions, the Patagonia Piton Hybrid fleece vest takes the edge off. Hybrid design works well as an under layer or outer layer. Features Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) with Hardface(R) Technology in key areas: jacket front, then wrapping over the shoulders and down to mid-back. Wind Pro's durable face is water repellent and abrasion resistant; the Durable Water Repellent finish adds extra protection. Remaining areas of main body use super breathable, stretchy and wicking Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fabric; smooth jersey face slides easily beneath layers. Warm brushed-fleece interior moves moisture quickly to the fabric face. Microfleece-lined collar and chin guard; stretch binding on armholes and hem. Zippered handwarmer pockets are pack- and harness-compatible. Vest is shoulder-seam-free for comfort underneath a pack. Polartec Wind Pro contains 50% recycled polyester/40% polyester/10% spandex. Polartec Power Dry contains 54% recycled polyester/40% polyester/6% spandex. Patagonia Piton Hybrid fleece vest has a slim fit.
short_description: On blustery approaches, chilly rock routes and full-on alpine missions, the Patagonia Piton Hybrid fleece vest takes the edge off. Hybrid design works well as an under layer or outer layer.
